# manners

The goal of `manners` is to provide `usethis`-like interface to functions underlying [`polite`] package

## Installation

You can install the development version of `manners` from [GitHub](https://www.github.com) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("dmi3kno/manners")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
manners::use_manners()
```
